articles.title: Sources - Brooklyn Nets to shun trade-deadline offers for James Harden - ESPN.co.uk
articles.description: The Brooklyn Nets don't plan to engage any team that might try to pry James Harden ahead of the trade deadline or his possible free agency this summer, sources told ESPN.
